channel.title: Gloria | Spawn Tab | Summoning | Gloria Points System | Killstreaks | 24/7 | BRI
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/6h8186.png[/img]
Gloria - Created for PKing
**LINKS + DOWNLOADS** Webclient, to play now online: http://www.gloriarsps.enjin.com/playnow Downloads page: http://www.gloriarsps.zzl.org/downloads.html Main Website: http://www.gloriarsps.zzl.org _________________________________________________________ -Main Feautures- -NO GAMBLING :) <3 -::PURE - command. -SPAWN TAB -PK POINTS SYSTEM -KILLSTREAKS SYSTEM -Minigames -Gloria Points system + Implemented slayer in it. -Edited itemswitching to be the best. -Re-done magic and ranging combat, really sick. -New Godsword models, bandos models also. -Webclient and maxed uptimes 24/7 online. -City Pking -Edgeville PKing -Mage bank Pking -Summoning with pack-yak and steel titans etc etc... -Dragon Claws formula -508 Maps (non-bugged) also 718 Characters. Join us to see the rest features.
